mapper.select: select per.* from user_permission uPer left join permission per on per.id = uPer.permission_id where uPer.user_id = #{userId} and per.is_delete = 0

select per.* from user_permission uPer left join permission per on per.id = uPer.permission_id where uPer.user_id = #{userId} and per.type = #{type, typeHandler = com.lin.shiro.type.handler.EnumTypeHandler} and per.is_delete = 0 order by sort

choose.when:
select count(id) from permission where is_delete = 0
and type = #{type, typeHandler = com.lin.shiro.type.handler.EnumTypeHandler}
choose.otherwise:
select count(uPer.id) from user_permission uPer left join permission per on per.id = uPer.permission_id where per.is_delete = 0 and uPer.user_id = #{userId}
and per.type = #{type, typeHandler = com.lin.shiro.type.handler.EnumTypeHandler}
